name: Moar Needles!
description:
Moar Needles! is a fast paced needle shooter which gets harder if you are afraid to pull the trigger. 

Your objective is to shoot the ball full of needles and avoid  the obstacles on the ball surface. And you can't of course hit other needles. Ball rotation accelerates so you better be fast or it gets impossibru! Game has currently 15 levels and all levels are tested to be passable. (It might be harder than you think though)

This is an entry to the UDC Game Jam #17.
